Thought
Wanted an Experienced
Traveller, in the Account Book
and Printing Trades
Apply Box

No Overtime Allowed
The Overtime 9 per hour type. 8 d Binders
and the heavy Union Wages I ascribe my
bad balance this midsummer often the
overtime is but a cause of lens being done in
the regular hours - also Gas + poneyWT
